title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Game-Based Engineering Mathematics Learning: Customized Modules for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mathematical modeling process for engineering problems through in-game simulations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can solve applied calculus (differentiation/integration) problems with over 90% accuracy in three consecutive game-based assessments.
Learners can produce case reports applying mathematical approaches to real-world work scenarios through project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
